thought: First, I need to access the URL to obtain a status code.
observation: Navigating to https://frontrange-pc.com/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is accessible. Now, I need to check for the characteristics of a scam website.
observation: Welcome to Front Range Electronic Services  Home About Services Contact IT Company that focuses on YOUR needs Home office, small business, software, malware removal, and more! Our Services IT Services to meet your needs Front Range Electronic Services offers individualized services, custom to each client – no cookie cutters around here! Every business and client has a different and unique set of needs and requirements. That’s where we come in! We have solutions for nearly every project size and budget. We can run with small budgets or build you a million-dollar network – we do it all! How can we help? What we do  Small Business Support We can help set up new users, new computers, printers, servers, etc. Have something specific – just ask! We also manage Cloud Solutions including Office 365, and troubleshoot hardware, software, network, telephony, & internet issues.  Home Office Solutions Does your home office need some help? We can get you all squared away!  Equipment ordering & setup Spec equipment and assist to order for LAN and WiFi (including MESH) Networks, firewalls, switches, media converters, servers, workstations, laptops, printers, tablets and digital bulletin boards.  Software Installation Installation and troubleshooting for productivity, accounting, ERP, CAD, anti-virus, and malware removal. Front Range Electronic Services started in the early 1990s building high-end, custom computers for the cable TV industry. We have since broadened our business and, in 2000, we opened up a small computer shop and started to acquire residential and small business clients. Read More fres@frontrange-pc.com 970-290-5328 Customer Site Services or Remote Services offered. Our location is by appointment only: 7005 County Rd 126 ½ © 2024 Front Range Electronic Services. All Rights Reserved. Website by M Rock Creative.

thought: The website does not have unusually low prices or claims of free. It also does not claim to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. The text does not seem to target human psychological weaknesses, and the company information seems to be legitimate. The website offers IT services and does not handle different products from common e-commerce websites. The contact information provided seems appropriate for business use, and the privacy of customer information notation is clear. The payment methods are not listed, so it's unclear if they are unusual. The information on the website does not indicate that it has not been updated. The website https://frontrange-pc.com/ does not appear to be a scam website based on the characteristics analyzed.

observation.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. It offers legitimate IT services and provides clear and appropriate contact information.
